name: NINJA GARDEN (VOMITINGMOOSE)
description:
INSPIRED BY THE NINJA GAIDEN SERIES,

THIS "SPIRITUAL SUCCESSOR" AIMS TO PROVIDE REFUGE FOR THE UNFORGIVING LIFE OF A NINJA

TAKE A BREAK FROM ALL THE FIGHTING...

LEARN TO  BE STILL...

AND JUST BREATHE


K E Y B O A R D  C O N T R O L S :

WASD / ARROW KEYS = UP, LEFT, DOWN, RIGHT
WALK, SIT, STAND

Z / J / ALT = A BUTTON
INTERACT

X / K / CTRL = B BUTTON
BACK BUTTON

ENTER = START
STOP MUSIC

SHIFT = SELECT
TALK TO YOURSELF

C R E D I T S :

1ST GAME FOR THE 1ST CRIMSON JAM
MADE IN 2 DAYS BY VOMITINGMOOSE

MUSIC BY DEERTEARS
EDITED BY VOMITINGMOOSE

CREATED WITH GB STUDIO & ASEPRITE
EMOTES AND ASCII FONT ARE FROM GB STUDIO
